title: Bad Childhood, Good Life Week: Fallout With Mom
description:
Iris is an only child and raised by her mom who never married. When she attempts to show her mom attention, things don’t go right between them. - Dr. Laura: "Pity lets you care without drowning in emotion."

Have you gone out of your way with no results? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

Order Dr. Laura's book: “Bad Childhood, Good Life”

go to > https://www.drlaura.com/dr-laura-book-bad-childhood-good-life

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
